review: I had a lovely dinner at Little Lemon Restaurant last weekend. The atmosphere was cozy and welcoming, with a charming Mediterranean vibe. I ordered the lemon garlic chicken with roasted vegetables, and it was absolutely delicious—tender, flavorful, and beautifully presented. The staff was friendly and attentive without being overbearing!

Little Lemon exceeded my expectations. From the moment we walked in, the staff was incredibly hospitable. I had the grilled sea bass with lemon herb butter, and it was phenomenal. The ingredients tasted fresh and the flavors were well-balanced. The ambiance was calm and perfect for date night. Highly recommend!

Great experience at Little Lemon! The décor is stylish but not overdone, and the menu had plenty of vegetarian options, which I really appreciated. I had the lemon risotto and a citrus tart for dessert—both were delicious. Service was polite but a bit rushed. Still, I’d go again for the food alone!
